benefits.title: PPO Plan
benefits.description: Switch provides you two medical plan options of comprehensive coverage for you and your family at very affordable rates. The PPO plan design allows you to access any doctor at any time.  You do not need to obtain a referral to see a specialist. Using an In-Network provider through the United HealthCare CHOICE PLUS Network will provide you the highest level of benefits.

benefits.title: HSA Plan
benefits.description: Switch provides you two medical plan options of comprehensive coverage for you and your family at very affordable rates.  The Switch Health Savings Account (HSA) plan design allows you to access any doctor at any time. You do not need to obtain a referral to see a specialist. Using an In-Network provider through the United HealthCare CHOICE PLUS Network will provide you the highest level of benefits.

benefits.title: Teladoc
benefits.description: Teladoc gives you access 24 hours, 7 days a week to a U.S. board-certified doctor through the convenience of phone, video or mobile app visits.

benefits.title: Dental Coverage
benefits.description: The Switch Dental Plan provides you and your family the option to select coverage through United Healthcare Dental.

benefits.title: Vision Coverage (Base Vision Plan)
benefits.description: The Switch Vision Plan offers you two different plan options that will provide excellent benefits through VSP. By using VSP’s network you can receive an eye exam with glasses or contact lenses for a low copay. Lens options such as tinting, scratch resistant coating and anti-glare coating are available at discounted rates.

benefits.title: Vision Coverage (Buy Up Plan)
benefits.description: The Switch Vision Plan offers you two different plan options that will provide excellent benefits through VSP. By using VSP’s network you can receive an eye exam with glasses or contact lenses for a low copay. Lens options such as scratch resistant coating and anti-glare coating are available at no charge on the Buy Up Plan.

benefits.title: Life & Accidental Death & Dismemberment
benefits.description: Switch provides full-time employees with group life insurance up to $50,000 plus accidental death and dismemberment (AD&D) insurance equal to $50,000. Switch pays the full cost of this benefit. Please be sure to complete your beneficiary information.

benefits.title: Disability Insurance
benefits.description: Switch provides full-time employees with Company Paid Short-Term Disability and Long-Term Disability through The Standard Insurance. Disability income protection insurance provides a benefit for “Short term” and “Long term” disability resulting from a covered injury or sickness. Benefits begin at the end of the elimination period and continue while you are disabled up to the maximum benefit duration.

benefits.title: Flexible Spending Accounts (FSAs)
benefits.description: Flexible Spending Accounts (FSAs) provide you with an important tax advantage that can help you pay health care expenses on a pre-tax basis. By anticipating your family’s health care costs for the next year, you can lower your taxable income.

benefits.title: Employee Assistance Program
benefits.description: The Employee Assistance Program is a confidential, voluntary service that provides professional counseling and referral services designed to help you and your family members with personal, job or family related problems. Your EAP can help you and your dependents identify, resolve and gain control over personal problems that may be interfering with work and daily life. This plan is offered at NO cost to you!

benefits.title: Aflac Benefits
benefits.description: Switch LTD employees have the option of purchasing valuable voluntary benefits to help cover you and your family in the case of accidental injury, hospitalization, critical illness or death. The plans are supplemental to your regular health insurance plans. Aflac provide cash benefits to help cover expenses not covered by medical insurance.

benefits.title: Identity Protection
benefits.description: Switch offers enrollment in LifeLock Identity Theft Protection as a payroll deducted employee benefit

benefits.title: Paid Time Off (PTO)
benefits.description: Switch provides employees with Paid Time Off (PTO) from work to use for vacation, personal time, personal illness or any other leave of absence. PTO will be administered per calendar year. PTO accrual will be based upon length of service.

benefits.title: 401(k) Empower
benefits.description: We are EXTREMELY HAPPY to announce that Switch will be executing Safe Harbor matching to your 401(k) contribution effective the week of January 22, 2019. Which means, Switch will match your deferral 100% up to 3% of eligible compensation and 50% of the next 2%, further enhancing our truly REMARKABLE 401(k) plan.

benefits.title: 401(k) NEXT Retirement Solutions
benefits.description: If you have questions about your workplace retirement plan, like how much to save for retirement or how to create a diversified investment portfolio, help is just a phone call or email away.  The advisors at NRS, the same team that advises your organization on its workplace retirement plan, can help answer your retirement savings questions.

benefits.title: Discount Programs
benefits.description: Switch employees receive membership in the Employee Network, the Nation's Premier Employee Discount Program.  Club Ride is a free program of the Regional Transportation Commission of Southern Nevada (RTC) designed to improve air quality and encourage the use of commute alternatives such as carpool, vanpool, walking, bicycling and transit.  You are eligible to participate in Microsoft’s Software Assurance Home Use Program (HUP). This program enables you to get a licensed copy of most Microsoft® Office desktop PC applications to install and use on your home computer.  The CDW Employee Purchase Program (EPP) gives you discounts on the most popular technology products and allows you to save money on your personal computing needs.

benefits.title: Fitness for Life Gym Reimbursement
benefits.description: Provide proof of a gym membership and receive a $20.94 biweekly reimbursement (eligible 1st of the month following 60 days of employment).

benefits.title: Business Use Internet
benefits.description: Eligible employees who are expected to access internet from home may receive a $27.69 biweekly reimbursement (subject to manager approval).

benefits.title: Cell Phone
benefits.description: Eligible employees who are expected to make and receive work related calls on their personal cell phone may receive a $13.85 biweekly reimbursement (subject to manager approval).

benefits.title: Employer Paid Meals
benefits.description: During any full shift that you work at Switch, you may be entitled to meal-related benefits for meals eaten on premises which can save you close to $3,000 annually (tax-free). Switch believes in offering this exceptional benefit because the critical nature of our business requires non-stop availability.

benefits.title: Beverages
benefits.description: Switch provides various beverage options for employees. Ordering drinks with your meal should rarely be necessary.
